div.a: April Events Changed due to COVID-19

div.p: © 2015 City of Ashland, KY | 1700 Greenup Avenue, Ashland, KY 41101 | 606-385-3300

Ashland is part of the "metro triangle" that includes Ironton, Ohio and Huntington, West Virginia. The city encompasses 17.02 square miles with a population of approximately 21,025 citizens. Ashland is eastern Kentucky's largest urban area as well as a center for healthcare, commerce, banking, and recreational activities. We continue to expand in the areas of art, entertainment, and cultural events while moving toward an atmosphere of progression and growth.
